name: Nooh bin Sikander
about:
A resourceful and self initiated professional with hands-on experience and skill set in implementing Enterprise wide solutions of Applied Machine learning, Business Intelligence, Data Warehouse Modeling and ETL.Recently I've been moved into Data Science team. My head start was with a unique ML task for Arccos Golf. My previous work as a consultant had involved major aspects of the project life cycle, from design through to construction and implementation of data warehouse and BI. I have extensive experience with Cognos Business Intelligence tools specializing in Framework designing, canned reports development, interactive dashboards and self-service BI. Specialties include;Applied Machine learning. Python ML Suite. Performance Tuning and Query Optimization.Cognos full scale deployments. Databases: (HP Vertica, IBM DB2, Oracle, MS SQL Server)ETL: (IBM Infosphere Datastage 8.x/9.x , Talend Open Studio)
... see more

roles.jobDetails:
I tend to supervise the ongoing EDW/BI Projects because I've been rolled towards Machine Learning and Advance Analytics now. Responsibilities are beyond what we call Analytical Reporting.Worked as an Applied Data Scientist for some Clients having unique Machine Learning problems including but not limited to the World's 1st Smart Caddie by Arccos Golf. What was the precise Intelligence that we brought to Caddie? Please do have a look on the Official Preview below.Additional Expertise gained;- Applied Data Science (CRISP-DM)- Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Studio V1- Knime / Rapid Miner / SPSS- Python Stack:   - Data Analytics and Visualization (EDA).    - Preprocessing and Data Wrangling.    - Dimentionality Reduction.    - Features Engineering.    - Advance Machine Learning (Ensembling & Stacking). 

    


        
      

   
  









Arccos - Caddie

Arccos - Caddie



 

  
  









Arccos Caddie Preview

Arccos Caddie Preview

Lead a team of skilled EDW and Business Intelligence developers and successfully delivered some major Data Warehousing and Integration Projects including  an Integration project for Adamjee Insurance Company's UAE Division, BI initiative for AICL's Health Insurance & Faysal Bank's Master Data Management and Customer 360 Data Mart. During my tenure, I was also responsible to create a reliable team who can take the lead down the road. Additional Expertise Gained during the span;- Cognos (Framwork Modeling, Active Reports, Dimensional Modeling, Event Studio, Report Studio) - Data Warehouse Integration. - Master data Management. - Project Management- Documentation- Effort Estimations- Enablement Trainings.

My Primary role is to design, develop and implement complex Data-Warehouse systems, programs and BI Applications. I have worked with users/clients to identify and develop system tools taking into account desired results, hardware limitations and operating requirements. During my tenure I worked as an end-to-end ETL developer for Bank Al-Habib Limited.Major tasks include;• Understanding Enterprise Applications and their work flow.• Requirement gathering and solution designing.• Logical and physical data modelling.• Develop and unit test semantic layers, reports, and GUIs• Development associated with both ETL and BI phases using multiple tools/utilities.• Hands on experience in design, development and test processing jobs for realize ETL using IBM Infosphere Datastage and Talend Open Studio.• Experience in IBM Cognos BI Suite for developing semantic layer employing star and snow flake schemas.• Designed & implemented BI solutions including dimensional modelling, reports, interactive dashboards & self-service BI. • Experience in performance tuning of IBM Cognos, DB2 and InfoSphere DataStage.

education.title: BBIT (Bechelor of Businesss and Information Technology)
